Image.Alt: Four people smiling for the camera. The two folks on the right are in Class A uniforms. The two people in the middle are shaking hands with each other.
Image.Caption: David (center-right) receiving his Eagle award. To the far right is his father, and also a Troop 53 Eagle Scout, Paul D. Albertine.

Image.Alt: Four people smiling at the camera. The two in the middle are wearing Class A uniforms.
Image.Caption: Photo taken in front of the rank ladder, which shows all of the Cub Scout and Boy Scout ranks a scout can earn.
